value.original: Remove only the records matching this criteria

row.value: Remove only the records matching this criteria

value.original: HQL where clause that will be used to delete only the records that match this criteria. In case this field is not set, all records will be deleted.

row.value: HQL where clause that will be used to delete only the records that match this criteria. In case this field is not set, all records will be deleted.

value.original:
It is the date column that will be applied the "Older Than" filter to in order to determine the records to be removed.
In case no column is selected, "Creation Date" will be taken by default.

row.value:
It is the date column that will be applied the "Older Than" filter to in order to determine the records to be removed.
In case no column is selected, "Creation Date" will be taken by default.

value.original: Log table from which records will be deleted when clean up process is executed.

row.value: Log table from which records will be deleted when clean up process is executed.
